results.deck: The most recent of EA's Rugby games, Rugby 08 features new play modes such as the Rugby World Cup and the World Cup Challenge mode.
results.name: Rugby 08

results.deck: Formerly known as the NCAA March Madness Series, NCAA Basketball 09 is the exclusive NCAA Basketball game by EA Sports.  It serves as the only up-to-date college basketball simulation on the market.  Cover athlete is Kevin Love of the UCLA Bruins.
results.name: NCAA Basketball 09

results.deck: This was to be a remake of Aquanox 2: Revelation for PS2, but it didn't pass Sony's software quality assurance tests and because of that the studio was closed and the game got canceled.
results.name: AquaNox: The Angel's Tears

results.deck: From the developers of Super Robot Wars and Armored Core, this is exactly what you'd expect: an Armored Core-style 3D action game featuring robots from a plethora of different anime series.
results.name: Another Century's Episode 2

results.deck: It's a game about battling robots. No, not the giant kind - the small, remote-controlled kind that you can actually buy or build these days if you have enough time and money.
results.name: THE Robot Tsukurou Ze!

results.deck: NCAA Football 10 is the 13th game in the EA's NCAA Football series. This edition of the heralded college football simulator has added a few new features to the series, such as player lock on offense and defense, higher camera angles, and a create-a-school feature.
results.name: NCAA Football 10

results.deck: Wrestle Angel Survivor is similar to previous Wrestle Angels games in that it features a card battling system, all-female wrestlers, and a mode in which you manage a Wrestling company.
results.name: Wrestle Angels: Survivor

results.deck: A wrestling game for the PS2.
results.name: Wrestle Angels: Survivor 2

results.deck: The official video game of the England International football team, fully endorsed by the Football Association.
results.name: England International Football

results.deck: Smash Cars is a racing game where you take control of an RC car and try to finish first, all while staying in one piece. The game also features a trick system, but it is a bit inconsistent.
results.name: Smash Cars

results.deck: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock is a standalone game that packages up 20 classic rock songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from The Who, Rush, Boston and The Police, among others.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name, G-Force follows a team of guinea pigs who have secret lives as spies....IN 3-D!!!
results.name: G-Force

results.deck: Sequel to Mana Khemia.
results.name: Mana-Khemia 2: Fall of Alchemy

results.deck: An icy re-imagining of the classic Silent Hill, which trades weapons for frantic chase sequences as the player tries desperately to flee pursuing enemies. It takes on more of an adventure game format than traditional survival-horror.
results.name: Silent Hill: Shattered Memories

results.deck: SD Gundam G Generation Wars is the newest entry in the G Generation franchise, featuring the G Gen debut of Mobile Suit Gundam 00. The new "Wars Break" system allows for crossover encounters.
results.name: SD Gundam G Generation Wars

results.deck: Scooby-Doo! First Frights is an action platformer that features Scooby-Doo and the Gang as kids.
results.name: Scooby-Doo! First Frights

results.deck: The dynamic duo returns to resolve an Eco shortage in this High Impact-developed sequel to Naughty Dog's popular platformer franchise.
results.name: Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier

results.deck: 2000 WCT champion Sunny Garcia lends his name to Sunny Garcia Surfing by Ubi Soft.
results.name: Sunny Garcia Surfing

results.deck: Real Madrid: The Game is the official game of Real Madrid football club.
results.name: Real Madrid: The Game

results.deck: Nobunaga's Ambition: Iron Triangle is the latest PS2 game in the series.
results.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Iron Triangle

results.deck: The original Trivial Pursuit board game with two new, exclusive game modes and a variety of downloadable question packs on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Trivial Pursuit

results.deck: Based on the 2006 direct-to-video film of the same name.
results.name: Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 is the 9th and latest game in the popular Pro Evolution Soccer series. The game is being developed and published by Konami for release on Sony's PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable; Microsoft's Xbox 360 and Windows; Nintendo's Wii and for Mobile Phones
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010

results.deck: Turn based RPG set 15 years after the events of PoPoRoGue.
results.name: PoPoLoCrois: A New Adventure

results.deck: A portable version of the Blokus board game featuring characters from the Steambot Chronicles franchise.
results.name: Blokus Portable: Steambot Championship

results.deck: no info
results.name: RTL Biathlon 2009

results.deck: An uninspired collection of candy-themed minigames that will quickly be forgotten.
results.name: M&M's Adventure

results.deck: A game based on the Jelly Belly brand of jelly beans.
results.name: Jelly Belly: Ballistic Beans

results.deck: Pimp my Ride: Street Racing was the second game related to the automotive show.
results.name: Pimp My Ride Street Racing

results.deck: "Gentle Bite" is a dating simulation game.
results.name: Amagami

results.deck: Activision and the History Channel bring you back to the Civil War.
results.name: History Channel: Civil War - Secret Missions

results.deck: A street-racing vehicular combat game.
results.name: DT Carnage

results.deck: The King of Fighters 2002 Unlimited Match is an enhanced remake of the original KOF2002 that includes every character from the "NESTS Saga."
results.name: The King of Fighters 2002 Unlimited Match

results.deck: An adventure game featuring characters from multiple Tales games.
results.name: Tales of Fandom Vol. 2 Luke/Tear Version

results.deck: Play as Samantha, Clover, and Alexandra as they tackle both assignments from the World Organization Of Human Protection (WOOHP) and high school. Play different types of mini-games on 10 different game boards and become the ultimate spy.
results.name: Totally Spies! Totally Party

results.deck: A visual novel about a boy who must prevent a girl from being killed by a psychic.
results.name: 12Riven: The Psi-Climinal of Integral

results.deck: Clear indication that a company is running out of name ideas: X. More Crazy Chicken with the letter X!
results.name: Crazy Chicken: X

results.deck: Adventure game developed by VRIDGE and published by D3
results.name: Little Anchor

results.deck: One of two versions of Splinter Cell: Double Agent.  While both generally follow the same story, the two have vital differences in gameplay and overall structure.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent

results.deck: Adventures of Pinocchio is a game for the Wii
results.name: Adventures of Pinocchio

results.deck: Cinderella's Fairy Tale, or just Cinderella, was a game released by Phoenix Games on the PlayStation 2 and Wii.
results.name: Cinderella's Fairy Tale

results.deck: The Buzz franchise continues with trivia relating to The Great Southland (Australia).
results.name: Buzz: Brain of Oz

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam Encounters in Space is a game based on the popular anime license. This game is focused on space battles only with your gundam rarely touching ground, as there are no planet side battles.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space

results.deck: PDC World Championship Darts is the first installment in the dart franchise.
results.name: PDC World Championship Darts

results.deck: Petanque Pro is a Ptanque game by Mere Mortals.
results.name: Petanque Pro

results.deck: The Ultimate Trivia  Quiz
results.name: The Ultimate Trivia Quiz

results.deck: Play the part of Johnny Bravo and compete against rival studs over a number of events to win a date with the chick on the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama TV show!
results.name: Johnny Bravo: The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!

results.deck: The tenth title in Koei's long running strategy game series set in ancient China.
results.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms X

results.deck: Band Hero is a spin-off game of the Guitar Hero series by Activision released for the Xbox 360 Playstation 3, Wii and Nintendo DS.
results.name: Band Hero

results.deck: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is a Beat'em Up from Konami, based on the 2003 animated series.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

results.deck: D3 is publishing this game version of the upcoming Astro Boy movie.
results.name: Astro Boy: The Video Game

results.deck: Short Track, Stock Car racing for the PS2
results.name: Short Track Racing: Trading Paint

results.deck: Star Wars: The Clone Wars -- Republic Heroes takes place during the first and second seasons of the TV cartoon Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It features the art style of the cartoon and was released on Xbox 360, Wii, PC, Nintendo DS and Playstation.
results.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes

results.deck: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan is a Japanese puzzle game
results.name: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan

results.deck: A visual novel based on the second season of the Rosario to Vampire anime series.
results.name: Rosario to Vampire Capu2: Koi to Yume no Kyousoukyoku

results.deck: Rock Band Country Track Pack is a standalone game that wraps up 21 country songs into one retail package.  The songs are a collection of previously released DLC, as well as new tracks that have yet to appear in any Rock Band game.
results.name: Rock Band: Country Track Pack

results.deck: Gravity Games Bike: Street Vert Dirt is a BMX game for the Playstation 2 and Xbox
results.name: Gravity Games Bike: Street Vert Dirt

results.deck: This version of Family Feud was released for the PC, PS2 and GBA. Atomic Planet developed the GBA version and Ingram Entertainment developed the PS2 and PC versions, all of which were published by Global Star Entertainment.
results.name: Family Feud

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter is a 2007 release of the trophy hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter

results.deck: The first game in Nippon Ichi's series of urban legend themed visual novel adventure games, where the player steps into the role of a young police detective who must solve a series of mysterious cases.
results.name: Hayarigami: Toshi Densetsu Kaii Jiken

results.name: NCAA Final Four 2004

results.name: DT Racer Refueled

results.deck: A third-person shooter based on Vertigo's 100 Bullets comic book. It was canceled when the developer, Acclaim, went bankrupt, and later attempts to revive the project never came to fruition.

results.deck: Adiboo and the Energy Thieves was an Educational Action game created by Coktel Vision. Unfortunately, that's all anybody knows about this extremely amazing looking game.
